mapper.insert: insert into mongodb (`tenant_id`, `tenant_uuid`, `database`, `username`, `password`, `host`, `option`) values (#{tenantId}, #{tenantUuid}, #{database}, #{username}, #{passwordPlain}, #{host}, #{option}) on duplicate key update `database` = #{database}, `username` = #{username}, `password` = #{passwordPlain}, `host` = #{host}, `option` = #{option}
mapper.select: SELECT tenant_id AS tenantId, tenant_uuid AS tenantUuid, `database`, username, `password` AS passwordCipher, `host`, `option` FROM mongodb a JOIN `tenant` b ON a.tenant_uuid = b.uuid AND b.is_active = 1
SELECT tenant_id AS tenantId, tenant_uuid AS tenantUuid, `database`, username, `password` AS passwordCipher, `host`, `option` FROM mongodb
SELECT tenant_id AS tenantId, tenant_uuid AS tenantUuid, `database`, username, `password` AS passwordCipher, `host`, `option` FROM mongodb where tenant_id = #{value}
